org.melior.logging.core

Interface Logger


  • public interface Logger
    The internal logger that is available to the service and to all of the service components.
    Since:
    2.1
    Author:
    Melior

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void debug(String methodName, Object... messageParts)
      Log message at debug logging level, if it is enabled.
      void error(String methodName, Object... messageParts)
      Log message at error logging level, if it is enabled.
      String getName()
      Get name.
      void info(String methodName, Object... messageParts)
      Log message at info logging level, if it is enabled.
      boolean isDebugEnabled()
      Indicate whether debug level logging is enabled.
      boolean isErrorEnabled()
      Indicate whether error level logging is enabled.
      boolean isInfoEnabled()
      Indicate whether info level logging is enabled.
      boolean isTraceEnabled()
      Indicate whether trace level logging is enabled.
      boolean isWarnEnabled()
      Indicate whether warn level logging is enabled.

      Log message at trace logging level, if it is enabled.
      void transaction(String methodName, TransactionContext transactionContext)
      Log successful transaction.
      void transaction(String methodName, TransactionContext transactionContext, String stackTracePrefix, Throwable throwable)
      Log failed transaction.

      Log message at warn logging level, if it is enabled.

                 TransactionContext transactionContext,
                 String stackTracePrefix,
                 Throwable throwable)
        Log failed transaction.

        transactionContext - The transaction context
        stackTracePrefix - The stack trace prefix, or null if no prefix is required
